anya-e0805n2:6_3: purisotiādīnañhi pakatippaccayādivibhāgakappanāya nipphāditānaṁ saddappatirūpakānaṁ nāmikapadānaṁ paṭhamaṁ ṭhapetabbaṁ pakatirūpaṁ apākaṭattā,
anya-e0805n2:6_7: liṅganato vā liṅganti anvatthanāmavasena vā “dhātuppaccayavibhattivajjitamatthavaṁ liṅga”nti vacanato
anya-e0805n2:6_8: parasamaññāvasena vā liṅganti idha pāṭipadikāparanāmadheyyaṁ syādivibhatyantapadapakatirūpameva vuccatīti
anya-e0805n2:7_0: Liṅgassattho nāma pabandhavisesākārena pavattamāne rūpādayo upādāya paññāpīyamāno tadaññānaññabhāvena
anya-e0805n2:7_1: anibbacanīyo samūhasantānādibhedo upādāpaññattisaṅkhāto ghaṭapaṭādivohārattho ca pathavīdhātuphassādīnaṁ
anya-e0805n2:8_2: Tattha kammādīsu dutiyādīnaṁ vidhīyamānattā kammādisaṁsaggarahito liṅgasaṅkhyāparimāṇayutto,
anya-e0805n2:8_3: tabbinimuttupasaggādipadatthabhūto ca suddho saddattho idha liṅgattho nāma.
anya-e0805n2:9_0: Yo pana ākhyātakitakataddhitasamāsehi vutto kammādisaṁsaṭṭho attho,
anya-e0805n2:9_1: sopi dutiyādīnaṁ puna attanā vattabbassa atthavisesassābhāvena avisayattā,
anya-e0805n2:13_0: Saliṅge tāva – eso puriso, ete purisā, esā kaññā, etā kaññāyo, etaṁ cittaṁ, etāni cittāni.
anya-e0805n2:16_0: Liṅgādivinimutte sattāmatte – ca vā ha ahaṁ atthi sakkālabbhā iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:17_0: “Liṅgatthe paṭhamā”ti adhikicca “ālapane cā”ti ālapanatthe ca paṭhamā,
anya-e0805n2:18_0: Ettha ca āmantanaṁ nāma pageva laddhasarūpassa saddena abhimukhīkaraṇaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:18_2: tasmā āmantanasamaye kriyāyogābhāvato idaṁ kārakavohāraṁ na labhati.
anya-e0805n2:22_0: Bho purisa ehi, bho purisā vā, bhavanto purisā etha.
anya-e0805n2:26_0: Anabhihite evāyaṁ, “kammani dutiyāyaṁ tto”ti vacanañcettha ñāpakaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:28_0: “Yena vā kayirate taṁ karaṇa”nti ito “vā”ti vattate.
anya-e0805n2:30_0: Yaṁ vā karoti, yaṁ vā vikaroti, yaṁ vā pāpuṇāti, taṁ kārakaṁ kammasaññaṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n2:31_4: taṁ pana kārakaṁ chabbidhaṁ kammaṁ kattā karaṇaṁ sampadānamapādānamokāso cāti.
anya-e0805n2:31_6: parikappato vā kammādimhi satiyeva kriyābhāvato kammādīnaṁ channampi kārakavohāro siddhova hoti.
anya-e0805n2:32_0: Taṁ pana kammaṁ tividhaṁ nibbattanīyaṁ vikaraṇīyaṁ pāpaṇīyañcāti. Yathā –
anya-e0805n2:36_0: Ettha ca icchitānicchitakathitākathitādibhedamanapekkhitvā sabbasaṅgāhakavasena “yaṁ karoti taṁ kamma”nti vuttattā,
anya-e0805n2:36_1: atthantaravikappanavādhikārato ca sabbattha imināva kammasaññā hoti.
anya-e0805n2:38_2: Ettha hi “kambala”miti kathitakammaṁ dvikammikāya yācanakriyāya pattumicchitatarattā.
anya-e0805n2:41_0: 286.Gati buddhi bhuja paṭha hara kara sayādīnaṁ kārite vā.
anya-e0805n2:42_7: si saye iccevamādīnaṁ dhātūnaṁ payoge kārite sati payojjakakattubhūte kammani liṅgamhā dutiyāvibhatti hoti vā.
anya-e0805n2:45_0: Abhihite na bhavati, purisena puriso gāmaṁ gamīyate, sisso dhammaṁ bodhīyate iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:47_1: Kāladdhānaṁ dabbaguṇakriyāhi accantasaṁyoge tehi kāladdhānavācīhi liṅgehi dutiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n2:49_0: Addhāne – yojanaṁ vanarāji, yojanaṁ dīgho pabbato, kosaṁ sajjhāyati.
anya-e0805n2:50_0: Accantasaṁyogeti kiṁ? Māse māse bhuñjati, yojane yojane vihāraṁ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0805n2:52_0: Kammappavacanīyehi nipātopasaggehi yutte yoge sati liṅgamhā dutiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n2:53_0: Kammaṁ pavacanīyaṁ yesaṁ te kammappavacanīyā, parasamaññāvasena vā anvādayo kammappavacanīyā.
anya-e0805n2:55_0: Lakkhaṇādīsu “lakkhaṇi’tthambhūtakkhānabhāga vicchāsu pati pari anavo”ti pati pari anūnaṁ kammappavacanīyasaññā vuttā.
anya-e0805n2:56_0: Lakkhaṇe sūriyuggamanaṁ pati dibbā bhakkhā pātubhaveyyuṁ,
anya-e0805n2:57_0: Itthambhūtakkhāne sādhu devadatto mātaraṁ pati, mātaraṁ pari, mātaraṁ anu.
anya-e0805n2:58_0: Bhāge yadettha maṁ pati siyā, maṁ pari, maṁ anu, taṁ dīyatu.
anya-e0805n2:60_1: Taṁ kho pana bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato,
anya-e0805n2:63_2: Antarā ca rājagahaṁ antarā ca nāḷandaṁ addhānamaggappaṭipanno,
anya-e0805n2:63_3: rājagahassa ca nāḷandāya ca majjheti attho.
anya-e0805n2:66_0: Tatiyāsattamīnamatthe ca kvaci liṅgamhā dutiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n2:68_0: Sattamiyatthe– kāle, upānvajjhāvasassa payoge, adhisiṭṭhāvasānaṁ payoge, tappānacāre ca dutiyā.
anya-e0805n2:69_0: Kāle tāva – pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā, ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā. Imaṁ rattiṁ cattāro mahārājāno.
anya-e0805n2:71_0: Tappānacāresu – nadiṁ pivati, gāmaṁ carati iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:77_0: Yena vā kattā upakaraṇabhūtena vatthunā kriyaṁ abyavadhānena karoti,
anya-e0805n2:78_1: ettha ca satipi sabbakārakānaṁ kriyāsādhakatte “yena vā kayirate”ti visesetvā vacanaṁ kattūpakaraṇabhūtesu kārakesu sādhakatamasseva gahaṇatthaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:81_0: Sambhāvīyati taṁ vuttaṁ, karaṇaṁ nāma kāraka”nti.
anya-e0805n2:86_0: Kattari ca kārake liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n2:89_0: Yo kriyaṁ attappadhāno hutvā karoti, so kattusañño hoti.
anya-e0805n2:90_3: Yo aññaṁ kātuṁ samatthaṁ akarontaṁ kammaṁ niyojeti,
anya-e0805n2:91_0: Yaṁ pana tattha tattha gacchati devadatto,
anya-e0805n2:91_4: kiṁ tattha payojakabyāpārena akarontaṁ balena kārayati,
anya-e0805n2:95_0: Yo kattāraṁ kāreti, so hetusañño hoti, kattā cāti hetukattusaññā.
anya-e0805n2:96_0: Yo pana parassa kriyaṁ paṭicca kammabhūtopi sukarattā sayameva sijjhanto viya hoti,
anya-e0805n2:99_0: Appayutto payutto vā, sa kattāti pavuccati.
anya-e0805n2:104_0: Nanu ca “saṁyogo jāyate”tiādīsu kathaṁ pure asato jananakriyāya kattubhāvosiyāti? Vuccate –
anya-e0805n2:104_2: avijjamānampi hi loko saddābhidheyyatāya vijjamānaṁ viya gahetvā voharati,
anya-e0805n2:104_5: aññathā sutamayañāṇenapi paccakkhena viya vatthusabhāvasacchikaraṇappasaṅgo ca musāvāda kudiṭṭhivādādīnamabhāvappasaṅgo ca siyā,
anya-e0805n2:104_6: tasmā buddhiparikappitapaññattivasenapi saddappavatti hotīti asato saṁyogādissapi hoteva jananakriyāya kattukārakatāti.
anya-e0805n2:108_0: Buddhiyā gahitattā hi, saṁyogo jāyate iti;
anya-e0805n2:111_0: Abhihite na bhavati. Kaṭaṁ karoti devadatto, kāreti vā.
anya-e0805n2:112_1: sā bhinnena sīsena paggharantena lohitena paṭivissakānaṁ ujjhāpesi,
anya-e0805n2:112_2: ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṁ navaṁ pattaṁ cetāpeyya,
anya-e0805n2:120_0: Saha saddhiṁ samaṁ nānā vinā alaṁ kimiccevamādīhi yoge liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti,
anya-e0805n2:121_0: Tattha sahasaddena yogo kriyā guṇa dabba samavāye sambhavati. Yathā –
anya-e0805n2:121_6: sabbehi me piyehi manāpehi nānābhāvo vinābhāvo,
anya-e0805n2:122_0: Sahatthe– devadatto rājagahaṁ pāvisi kokālikena pacchāsamaṇena, dukkho bālehi saṁvāso.
anya-e0805n2:124_0: Yogaggahaṇamihānuvattate, hetvatthe, hetvatthappayoge ca liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n2:131_0: Kena pāṇi kāmadado, kena pāṇi madhussavo;
anya-e0805n2:132_0: Kena te brahmacariyena, puññaṁ pāṇimhi ijjhati.
anya-e0805n2:133_0: Hetvatthappayoge – kena nimittena, kena payojanena, kenaṭṭhena, kena hetunā vasati.
anya-e0805n2:138_0: Yena byādhimatā aṅgena aṅgino vikāro lakkhīyate,
anya-e0805n2:138_2: Ettha ca aṅgamassa atthīti aṅgaṁ, sarīraṁ.
anya-e0805n2:141_0: Sāriputtoti nāmena, vissuto paññavā ca so;
anya-e0805n2:151_0: 302.Yassa dātukāmo rocate dhārayate vā taṁ sampadānaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:156_0: Sampadānaṁ tidhā vuttaṁ, rukkha yācaka bhikkhavo”ti.
anya-e0805n2:160_0: 303.Silāgha hanu ṭhā sapa dhāra piha kudha duhi ssāsūya rādhikkha paccāsuṇa anupatigiṇapubbakattārocanatthatadattha
anya-e0805n2:160_1: tumatthālamattha maññānādarappāṇini gatyatthakammani āsisattha sammuti bhiyyasattamyatthesu ca.
anya-e0805n2:161_10: usūya dosāvikaraṇe iccetesaṁ tadatthavācīnañca dhātūnaṁ payoge ca rādha hiṁsāsaṁrādhesu,
anya-e0805n2:161_11: ikkha dassanaṅkesūti imesaṁ payoge ca pati āpubbassa su savaṇeti imassa ca anupatipubbassa gesaddeti imassa ca pubbakattā ca ārocanatthappayoge, tadatthe, tumatthe,
anya-e0805n2:161_12: alamatthappayoge ca maññatippayoge anādare appāṇini ca gatyatthānaṁ kammani ca āsisatthappayoge ca sammuti
anya-e0805n2:161_13: bhiyyappayogesu ca sattamyatthe cāti taṁ kammādikārakaṁ sampadānasaññaṁ hoti,
anya-e0805n2:161_14: casaddaggahaṇena pahiṇatikappati pahoti upamāñjalikaraṇa phāsu atthaseyyappabhutiyoge ca pure viya catutthī.
anya-e0805n2:162_0: Silāghādippayoge tāva – buddhassa silāghate. Upajjhāyassa silāghate, thometīti attho.
anya-e0805n2:163_0: Hanute mayhameva, hanute tuyhameva, apalapatīti attho.
anya-e0805n2:164_2: Bhikkhussa bhuñjamānassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭheyya.
anya-e0805n2:165_0: Tuyhaṁ sapate, mayhaṁ sapate, ettha ca sapanaṁ nāma saccakaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:168_0: Kodhādiatthānaṁ payoge yaṁ pati kopo, tassa kujjha mahāvīra, yadihaṁ tassa kuppeyyaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:169_0: Duhayati disānaṁ megho, yo mittānaṁ na dubbhati.
anya-e0805n2:171_0: Dujjanā guṇavantānaṁ usūyanti, kā usūyā vijānataṁ.
anya-e0805n2:173_0: Āyasmato upālittherassa upasampadāpekkho upatisso, āyasmantaṁ vā.
anya-e0805n2:174_0: Paccāsuṇa anupatigiṇānaṁ pubbakattā ca suṇotissa dhātussa paccāyoge,
anya-e0805n2:174_1: giṇassa ca anupatiyoge pubbassa kammuno yo kattā,
anya-e0805n2:175_0: Yo vadeti sa kattāti, vuttaṁ kammanti vuccati;
anya-e0805n2:177_6: Ettha ca ārocanasaddassa kathanappakāratthattā desanatthādippayogepi catutthī.
anya-e0805n2:181_0: Akārantato liṅgamhā parassa catutthekavacanassa āyādeso hoti vā, saralopādi.
anya-e0805n2:182_1: piṇḍapātaṁ paṭisevāmi neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya,
anya-e0805n2:183_0: Tumatthe – lokānukampāya, lokamanukampitunti attho. Tathā phāsuvihārāya.
anya-e0805n2:187_0: Anādareti kiṁ? Suvaṇṇaṁ taṁ maññe. Appāṇinīti kiṁ? Gadrabhaṁ tuvaṁ maññe.
anya-e0805n2:190_0: Sammutippayoge – sādhu sammuti me tassa bhagavato dassanāya.
anya-e0805n2:192_0: Sattamiyatthe āvikaraṇa pātubhavanādiyoge – tuyhañcassa āvikaromi, tassa me sakko pāturahosi.
anya-e0805n2:196_1: sotthisvāgatādīhi ca yoge liṅgamhā catutthīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n2:205_0: Taṁ pana tividhaṁ visayabhedena niddiṭṭhavisayaṁ, upāttavisayaṁ, anumeyyavisayañcāti.
anya-e0805n2:207_2: tathāpi cittasaṁyogapubbakassa apagamanassa sambhavato iminā ca apādānasaññā.
anya-e0805n2:208_0: Yattha pana apagamanakriyaṁ upāttaṁ ajjhāhaṭaṁ visayaṁ katvā pavattati,
anya-e0805n2:209_2: Ettha hi kenaci guṇena ukkaṁsīyantīti anumeyyova kriyāviseso.
anya-e0805n2:214_0: Calaṁ yathā – dhāvatā hatthimhā patito aṅkusadhārī.
anya-e0805n2:219_2: upasaggayoge ca ādisaddena nipātayoge ca taṁyuttaṁ kārakaṁ apādānasaññaṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n2:222_1: mariyādābhividhiatthe āyoge patinā patinidhipatidānatthena yoge ca. Yathā –
anya-e0805n2:222_12: buddhasmā pati sāriputto dhammadesanāya ālapati temāsaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:223_3: Vinā saddhammā natthañño koci nātho loke vijjati.
anya-e0805n2:224_2: ito pakkhasmā migaṁ vijjhatīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n2:228_3: rājato vā corato vā aggito vā udakato vā nānābhayato vā nānārogato vā nānāupaddavato vā ārakkhaṁ gaṇhantu.
anya-e0805n2:232_0: Vāti kiṁ? Jetavane antarahito. Yenāti kiṁ? Yakkho tattheva antaradhāyati.
anya-e0805n2:235_0: Ettha ca dūrantikañca dūrantikatthañcāti dūrantikanti sarūpekasesaṁ katvā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:237_0: Antikatthappayoge – antikaṁ gāmā, āsannaṁ gāmā, samīpaṁ gāmā, gāmassa samīpanti attho.
anya-e0805n2:240_1: ito ekanavutikappamatthake vipassī bhagavā loke udapādi,
anya-e0805n2:243_0: Vibhattaṁ nāma sayaṁ vibhattasseva tadaññato guṇena vibhajanaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:243_2: yato paṇītataro vā visiṭṭhataro vā natthi,
anya-e0805n2:245_2: mātito ca pitito ca suddho anupakkuṭṭho agarahito.
anya-e0805n2:247_2: kasmā nu tumhaṁ daharā na mīyare,
anya-e0805n2:250_2: gambhīrato ca puthulato ca yojanaṁ candabhāgāya parimāṇaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:251_0: Dīghaso nava vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā pamāṇikā kāretabbā.
anya-e0805n2:252_0: Ettha ca “smāhismiṁna”miccādito “smā”ti ca “so, vā”ti ca vattamāne
anya-e0805n2:254_0: Dīgha oraicceteti smāvacanassa soādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0805n2:256_1: ettha ca pubbaggahaṇaṁ adisatthavuttino pubbādiggahaṇassupalakkhaṇanti daṭṭhabbaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:259_0: Pañhakathanesu – kutosi tvaṁ, kuto bhavaṁ, pāṭaliputtato. Ettha ca kathanaṁ nāma vissajjanaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:261_1: kammassa katattā upacitattā ussannattā vipulattā uppannaṁ hoti cakkhuviññāṇa,
anya-e0805n2:261_2: na tāvidaṁ nāmarūpaṁ ahetukaṁ sabbattha sabbadā sabbesañca ekasadisabhāvāpattito.
anya-e0805n2:266_5: ananubodhā appaṭivedhā catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ adassanā evamidaṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ sandhāvitaṁ saṁsaritaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:271_2: taṁ pati so attho sāmisañño hoti.
anya-e0805n2:272_0: Ettha ca kriyābhisambandhābhāvā na kārakatā sambhavati.
anya-e0805n2:272_2: tathā hi “rañño puriso”ti vutte yasmā rājā dadāti,
anya-e0805n2:272_5: Evaṁ yo yassa āyatto sevakādibhāvena vā bhaṇḍabhāvena vā samīpa samūhāvayavavikāra kāriyaavatthā jāti guṇa kriyādivasena vā,
anya-e0805n2:272_6: tassa sabbassāpi so sambandhādhārabhūto visesanaṭṭhānī āgamīvasena tividhopi attho sāmī nāmāti gahetabbo.
anya-e0805n2:282_2: ettha ca rājā purisaṁ aññasāmito viseseti nivattetīti visesanaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:283_0: Bhaṇḍena sambandhe – pahūtaṁ me dhanaṁ sakka, etassa paṭivīso, bhikkhussa pattacīvaraṁ.
anya-e0805n2:286_0: Avayavasambandhe – manussasseva te sīsaṁ, rukkhassa sākhā.
anya-e0805n2:288_0: Kāriyasambandhe – yavassa aṅkuro, meghassa saddo, puttāpi tassa bahavo, kammānaṁ phalaṁ vipāko.
anya-e0805n2:289_0: Avatthāsambandhe – khandhānaṁ pātubhāvo, khandhānaṁ jarā, khandhānaṁ bhedo.
anya-e0805n2:300_0: Yajassa karaṇe – pupphassa buddhaṁ yajati, pupphena vā, ghatassa aggiṁ juhoti.
anya-e0805n2:301_3: Imameva kāyaṁ pūraṁ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati,
anya-e0805n2:304_5: santi hi bhante uḷārā yakkhā bhagavato pasannā,
anya-e0805n2:311_2: kiṁ nu kho ahaṁ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi,
anya-e0805n2:320_2: Ettha hi devadattataṇḍulānaṁ kattukammānaṁ dhāraṇato taṁsamavetaṁ āsanapacanasaṅkhātaṁ kriyaṁ dhāreti nāma.
anya-e0805n2:321_0: So panāyamokāso catubbidho byāpiko opasilesiko sāmīpiko vesayikoti.
anya-e0805n2:322_0: Tattha byāpiko nāma yattha sakalopi ādhārabhūto attho ādheyyena patthaṭo hoti,
anya-e0805n2:323_0: Opasilesiko nāma paccekasiddhānaṁ bhāvānaṁ yattha upasilesena upagamo hoti,
anya-e0805n2:324_0: Sāmīpiko nāma yattha samīpe samīpivohāraṁ katvā tadāyattavuttitādīpanatthaṁ ādhārabhāvo vikappīyati,
anya-e0805n2:326_0: Sabbopi cāyamādhāro padhānavasena vā parikappitavasena vā kriyāya patiṭṭhā bhavatīti okāsotveva vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0805n2:338_0: Sāmī issara adhipati dāyāda sakkhipatibhū pasūta kusalaiccetehi yoge chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti,
anya-e0805n2:341_1: jāti guṇa kriyā nāmehi samudāyato ekadesassa puthakkaraṇaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:341_2: tasmiṁ niddhāraṇatthe gamyamāne tato samudāyavāciliṅgamhā chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti,
anya-e0805n2:344_0: Anādare gamyamāne bhāvavatā liṅgamhā chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti,
anya-e0805n2:351_0: Kammatthe – bhikkhūsu abhivādenti, muddhani cumbitvā, purisassa bāhāsu gahetvā.
anya-e0805n2:356_3: saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi.
anya-e0805n2:357_0: Yā palālamayaṁ mālaṁ, nārī datvāna cetiye;
anya-e0805n2:360_0: Pañcamyatthe ca liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti. Kadalīsu gaje rakkhanti.
anya-e0805n2:362_0: Kālo nāma nimesa khaṇa laya muhutta pubbaṇhādiko,
anya-e0805n2:362_3: tasmiṁ kālatthe ca bhāvalakkhaṇe bhāvatthe ca liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n2:364_5: jāyamāne kho sāriputta bodhisatte ayaṁ dasasahassilokadhātu saṁkampi sampakampi sampavedhi.
anya-e0805n2:369_2: issaratthe ca vattamānehi upaadhiiccetehi yoge adhikissaravacane gamyamāne liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n2:370_5: sammutiupapattivisuddhidevasaṅkhātehi tividhehipi devehi sabbaññū buddhova adhikoti attho.
anya-e0805n2:371_0: Issaravacane – adhi brahmadatte pañcālā, brahmadattissarā pañcālāti attho.
anya-e0805n2:375_0: Pabhedā sattadhā kammaṁ, kattā pañcavidho bhave.
anya-e0805n2:376_0: Karaṇaṁ duvidhaṁ hoti, sampadānaṁ tidhā mataṁ;
anya-e0805n2:378_0: Vibhattiyo pana paccattavacanādivasena aṭṭhavidhā bhavanti. Yathāha
